machine_ip.name: Machine IP Address or Hostname
machine_ip.description: The IP address or hostname of your Meticulous Espresso machine (e.g., 192.168.1.100 or meticulous.local)

enable_delta_filtering.name: Enable Delta-Based Filtering
enable_delta_filtering.description: Use value change detection for sensors. When enabled, sensors only publish when their value changes by more than the configured delta threshold. (Default: true)

temperature_delta.name: Temperature Delta
temperature_delta.description: Minimum change in Â°C required to publish temperature updates for all temperature sensors (boiler, brew head, external sensors). (Default: 0.5)

pressure_delta.name: Pressure Delta
pressure_delta.description: Minimum change in bar required to publish pressure updates (current and target pressure). (Default: 0.2)

flow_delta.name: Flow Delta
flow_delta.description: Minimum change in ml/s required to publish flow rate updates (flow rate and target flow). (Default: 0.1)

weight_delta.name: Weight Delta
weight_delta.description: Minimum change in grams required to publish weight updates (shot weight and target weight). (Default: 0.1)

time_delta.name: Time Delta
time_delta.description: Minimum change in seconds required to publish time updates (shot timer and elapsed time). (Default: 0.1)

voltage_delta.name: Voltage Delta
voltage_delta.description: Minimum change in volts required to publish voltage readings. (Default: 1.0)

brightness_delta.name: Brightness Delta
brightness_delta.description: Minimum change in percentage points (0-100) required to publish brightness updates. (Default: 1)

stale_data_refresh_interval.name: Stale Data Refresh Interval
stale_data_refresh_interval.description: Force a full refresh of all sensor data after this time with no updates (in hours, 1-168). Ensures non-chatty sensors (settings, statistics, profile info) are periodically refreshed so Home Assistant doesn't forget them. (Default: 24)

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting. (Default: false)

mqtt_enabled.name: Enable MQTT
mqtt_enabled.description: Publish sensors via MQTT discovery (recommended). (Default: true)

mqtt_username.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_username.description: Optional username for MQTT broker. (Default: empty, auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: Optional password for MQTT broker. (Default: empty, auto-detected from HA MQTT integration)
